info.title: Changerawr API Documentation
info.description: The official documentation for the Changerawr API. rawr

get.description: not allowed - Setup endpoint only accepts POST requests

403.description: Setup already completed - Cannot run setup more than once

500.description: An unexpected error occurred during setup

post.description: the first admin user in the system

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching projects

get.description: a list of projects, including their latest changelog entry and entry count

400.description: Invalid input - Project name is required

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating the project

post.description: a new project and its associated changelog

isComplete.description: Indicates whether the setup has been completed (true if at least one user exists)

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while checking setup status

get.description: if the initial setup has been completed by verifying if any users exist in the database
endpoint only accepts POST requests for system configuration

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "An unexpected error occurred during configuration" } } }

error.example: An unexpected error occurred during configuration

post.description: up the initial system configuration. This endpoint can only be called once, before any system settings are configured.

get.description: not allowed - Admin user setup endpoint only accepts POST requests

403.description: Setup already completed - Cannot run setup more than once

500.description: An unexpected error occurred during setup

post.description: a new admin user for the application

500.description: An unexpected error occurred

post.description: up an OAuth provider during initial system setup

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching the project

get.description: a specific project, including its changelog and tags

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while deleting the project
An unexpected error occurred while updating the project
An unexpected error occurred while fetching dashboard statistics

get.description: dashboard statistics for the authenticated user, including recent projects, total project and changelog counts, and recent activity

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching requests

get.description: pending changelog requests for authenticated user

403.description: Forbidden - Only staff members can create requests

500.description: Internal Server Error
An unexpected error occurred while fetching settings

get.description: or creates the user's settings

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while updating settings
An unexpected error occurred during registration

post.description: a new user using an invitation token

400.description: Invalid input - Email must be a valid email address

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating the preview

post.description: a preview of a user's information

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while refreshing the token

post.description: the access token by providing a valid refresh token

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired access token

500.description: An unexpected error occurred during authentication

get.description: the access token and retrieves the user's data

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while logging out

post.description: the access and refresh tokens, and optionally invalidates the refresh token in the database

get.description: not allowed - Login endpoint only accepts POST requests

400.description: Validation failed - Invalid email or password format

500.description: An unexpected error occurred during login

post.description: a user with email and password, returning JWT tokens and user data

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to access this endpoint

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching users

get.description: a list of users with their email, name, role, creation date, and last login date. Only admins have access to this endpoint.

400.description: An active invitation already exists for this email

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating the invitation link

post.description: an invitation link for user registration. Only admins have access to this endpoint.

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching dashboard data

get.description: that the authenticated user has 'ADMIN' role

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching system configuration

get.description: the system configuration for the authenticated user

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while updating system configuration

patch.description: the system configuration for the authenticated user

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching API keys

get.description: a list of API keys for the authenticated user

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating an API key

post.description: a new API key for the authenticated user

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching audit logs

get.description: audit logs based on filters and pagination

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching the versions

get.description: the versions of a given project

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching the project settings

get.description: the project settings for a given project

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while updating the project settings

patch.description: the project settings for a given project

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching the changelog entries

get.description: the changelog entries for a given project

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating the changelog entry

post.description: a new changelog entry for a given project

403.description: Project is not public

500.description: An unexpected error occurred

get.description: the widget loader script for a public project

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role or the project is not public

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching the changelog entries

get.description: the changelog entries for a given public project, optionally paginated by cursor

403.description: Unauthorized - User does not have 'ADMIN' role

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while processing the request

patch.description: the status of a changelog request

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "Forbidden" } } }

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "Internal server error" } } }

put.description: a changelog entry by its ID. Only authorized users with role 'STAFF' or 'ADMIN' can update an entry.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "Forbidden" } } }

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "Internal server error" } } }

delete.description: a changelog entry by its ID. Only authorized users with role 'ADMIN' can delete an entry.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching providers

get.description: a list of available OAuth providers

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "message": { "type": "string" } } }

get.description: an invitation token and returns the associated user email, role, and expiration date.
a list of all invitation links in descending order by creation date. Requires admin permissions.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "Forbidden" } } }

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "Internal server error" } } }

get.description: the user details for the given user ID. Only admins can view user details.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "Forbidden" } } }

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "Internal server error" } } }

delete.description: the user with the given user ID. Only admins can delete users.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "Forbidden" } } }

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string", "example": "Internal server error" } } }

patch.description: the user details for the given user ID. Only admins can update user details.

403.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to access this endpoint

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while fetching providers

get.description: all OAuth providers

403.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to access this endpoint

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating provider

get.description: the details of an API key, including its name, last used date, created date, expiration date, revocation status, and permissions. Requires admin permissions.

delete.description: an API key, making it unable to be used for authentication. Requires admin permissions.

patch.description: an API key's name, revocation status, or expiration date. Requires admin permissions.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

get.description: the details of a changelog entry by its ID, including its title, content, version, tags, and creation/update timestamps. Requires user authentication and permission to view the project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to retrieve.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

put.description: the title, content, version, and tags of a changelog entry by its ID. Requires user authentication and permission to edit the project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to update.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

delete.description: a changelog entry if the user is an admin, or creates a deletion request if the user is staff. Requires user authentication and appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to delete.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

patch.description: the status (published/unpublished) of a changelog entry by its ID. Requires user authentication and permission to edit the project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: - The ID of the project the entry belongs to.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: - The ID of the changelog entry to update.

get.description: a list of project tags along with pagination metadata. Users must be authenticated to access this endpoint.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred

get.description: to OAuth provider authorization URL

parameters.name: providerName
parameters.description: - The name of the OAuth provider

schema.description: Redirect to dashboard or specified redirect URL

500.description: Authentication failed

get.description: the OAuth callback and completes authentication

parameters.name: providerName
parameters.description: - The name of the OAuth provider

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

delete.description: an invitation by marking it as used. Only admins have the permission to revoke invitations.

403.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

500.description: { "type": "object", "properties": { "error": { "type": "string" } } }

patch.description: a user's role to either 'ADMIN' or 'STAFF'. Only admins can perform this action. Requires user authentication.

403.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to access this endpoint

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while deleting provider

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: - The ID of the OAuth provider to delete

403.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to access this endpoint

500.description: An unexpected error occurred while updating provider

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: - The ID of the OAuth provider to update
